open.title: Openserve outage | Lenasia
open.description: Openserve has informed us of a network outage affecting Lenasia, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Openserve engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: MetroFibre outage | Hillside, Beaufort West
open.description: MetroFibre has informed us of a network outage affecting Hillside, Beaufort West, affected clients will experience no connectivity. MetroFibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: MetroFibre outage | Akasia
open.description: MetroFibre has informed us of a network outage affecting Akasia, affected clients will experience no connectivity. MetroFibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel Degraded Service | Mowbray
open.description: We are investigating reports of degraded service affecting clients on the Vumatel network in Mowbray. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: Afrihost and Vumatel are still investigating to determine the root cause of the degraded service and resolve it as soon as possible.

open.title: Vodacom Outage | Northern Region
open.description: We are investigating reports of intermittent connectivity affecting clients on the Vodacom network in Gauteng, Mpumalanga, Limpopo and North West Province. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

open.title: ZoomFibre Outage | Western Cape
open.description: We are investigating reports of no connectivity affecting clients on the ZoomFibre Network in the Western Cape. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: If you are still experiencing no connectivity, please reboot your Fibre ONT.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.
